content: page 1 v1 0 echoview fiber mill ponyfish beanie by christina danaee the project the ponyfish beanie is a relaxed fit ribbed beanie knit with one skein of our soft ranger bulky yarn it s perfect for anyone a great project for beginners this hat is knit in the round in a 1x1 rib with simple crown shaping inspired by the classic explorer hats worn by the crew of the belafonte in wes anderson s movie the life aquatic with steve zissou this winter accessory can be your companion on any adventure materials finished measurements - 1 skein of echoview fiber mill s ranger bulky one size - 90% merino 10% rambouillet 10 5 - 26 5cm tall 140 yards / 100 grams 17 - 43cm around stretches up to 25 -63 5cm -us 10 circular needle 16 gauge -us 10 dpns optional for crown decreases -stitch marker 18 sts x 20 row = 4 in rib pattern worked in -tapestry needle the round unstretched patter n designed for the echoview fiber mill by christina danaee pattern is intended for unlimited personal use please do not reproduce or sell this pattern or sell items that are knitting from it find more patterns and kits like this yarn and knitting supplies at www echoviewnc com or email ggouin@ehoviewnc com for more information page 2 v1 0 instructions abbreviations using the long tail cast-on method and circular needle k = knit cast on 72sts p = purl k2tog = knit two stitches together as one setup round knit all stitches joining to knit in the round place marker to indicate beginning of round being careful not to twist stitches round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round repeat round 1 until hat measures 9 -23cm from cast on edge decreases *note switch to dpns when working on a circular needle becomes uncomfortable * round 1 * k1 p1 x3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round rounds 2 * k1 p1 x3 k1 repeat from * to end of round at end of round remove m k1 replace marker this is the new beginning of round round 3 * p1 k1 x2 p1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 4 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 5 * p1 k1 x2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 6 * p1 k1 x2 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 7 *p1 k1 p1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 8 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 9 *p1 k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 10 *p1 k2 repeat from * to end of round round 11 *p1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round cut yarn leaving a 6 -28cm tail using a tapestry needle pull tail through remaining stitches finishing weave in ends pattern designed for the echoview fiber mill by christina danaee
